FR / EN

Cookpool

Built in 2021

https://cookpool.ch/
Laravel Vue.js Algolia CSS JavaScript DB modeling

TL ; DR

Note: the project is currently being finalised. The online version is therefore not yet the new version I have been working on.

My job was to add new functionalities to the website, while it was already in production. Here are the new features I added:

  • Home page redesign
    • Display of most popular items
      • Most liked recipes and comments
      • Most active users
      • Latest published cookbooks
    • Display of news feed. Displays the latest activities of followed users.
    • Display of the 10 most searched keywords
  • Searching functionality
    • Searching and filtering performed with Algolia
    • Search performed on all website elements (recipes, users, comments, cookbooks, recipes steps)
    • Autocomplete on search bar
    • Pagination specific to each element
    • Multiple search filters
      • Select multiple tags classified by categories
      • Multiple sliders of minimum - maximum values
